scripts.build:app-subpath: PASTE_SITE_URL=${PASTE_SITE_URL:-https://app.misonote.com/paste} VITE_BASE_PATH=/paste/ VITE_API_BASE=/paste/v1 VITE_SSO_REDIRECT_PATH=/paste/auth/callback VITE_SSO_POST_AUTH_PATH=/paste/ VITE_SSO_ISSUER=${VITE_SSO_ISSUER:-https://account.misonote.com} npm run build
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build:prod && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name paste-web --branch main --commit-dirty=true --commit-message "deploy web"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name paste-web --branch main --commit-dirty=true --commit-message "deploy web"
